list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add README and update workspace.xml and requirements.txt
Added a README.md with project details, installation steps, and usage instructions. Updated `.idea/workspace.xml` with new commit messages and task summaries. Corrected error handling and execution timing in the Jupyter notebook and added missing dependencies in `requirements.txt`.

component.name: FlaskConsoleOptions
component.custom-start-script: import sys sys.path.extend([WORKING_DIR_AND_PYTHON_PATHS]) from flask.cli import ScriptInfo locals().update(ScriptInfo(create_app=None).load_app().make_shell_context()) print("Python %s on %s\nApp: %s [%s]\nInstance: %s" % (sys.version, sys.platform, app.import_name, app.env, app.instance_path))

option.name: myCustomStartScript
option.value: import sys sys.path.extend([WORKING_DIR_AND_PYTHON_PATHS]) from flask.cli import ScriptInfo locals().update(ScriptInfo(create_app=None).load_app().make_shell_context()) print("Python %s on %s\nApp: %s [%s]\nInstance: %s" % (sys.version, sys.platform, app.import_name, app.env, app.instance_path))

task.summary:
Add initial MVP code for heart disease prediction
This commit introduces the initial version of the MVP for heart disease prediction. The notebook includes data loading, preprocessing, model training, and validation using several machine learning algorithms.

Refactor API and models for heart disease prediction
Moved existing models to new locations and improved naming conventions for better readability and project structure. Deleted obsolete files and added new Flask app with routes for patient management and prediction. Also included logger setup and updated requirements.

Add machine learning pipeline and test data files
Added .pkl files for the model, pipelines, and scaler. Included new test datasets for heart disease prediction. Updated the notebook with path adjustments and optimized hyperparameters for KNN.

Add MVP notebook for heart disease classification
This commit introduces a new Jupyter notebook for the MVP project located in the `.ipynb_checkpoints` directory. The notebook includes data loading, preprocessing steps, model training, and validation for heart disease classification using various machine learning models.

Rename and refactor `api/app.py`
Relocated `api/app.py` to `app.py` and updated module imports accordingly. Modified endpoint route from `/patient` to `/patients` and adjusted model path within the application. Added debug print statement for patient data on error.

Refactor and relocate `app.py`
Renamed `app.py` to `api/app.py` and adjusted import statements accordingly. Updated endpoint routes and added additional debug print statements for better error handling. Changes include modifications to `.idea/workspace.xml`, `dataSources.xml`, and `patient_schema.py`.

Refactor and update `workspace.xml` and Jupyter notebook.
Updated commit messages and task summaries in `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect refactor of `app.py`. Modified execution timing and corrected error handling in the Jupyter notebook for heart disease prediction.

Add README and update workspace.xml and requirements.txt
Added a README.md with project details, installation steps, and usage instructions. Updated `.idea/workspace.xml` with new commit messages and task summaries. Corrected error handling and execution timing in the Jupyter notebook and added missing dependencies in `requirements.txt`.
